text:
I’m using the word “individualized” a bit loosely here. The idea of working alone doesn’t just apply to people who do things by themselves. There are also great examples of teamwork, like songwriting duos such as Rodgers and Hammerstein, or inventors like the Wright brothers. 

What I really mean is that this philosophy works best for people who can focus on clear goals without the extra responsibilities that come with being part of a big group.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The passage explains that the idea of working individually also includes teamwork. It highlights examples like famous songwriters and inventors, emphasizing that focusing on clear goals is easier without the distractions of larger organizations.
